description:
Seidou Hishigata appears before Shinpei, who despairs over Hizuru`s death. Shinpei learns another clue to defeat Shide, who may be keeping a reserve of his own corpses as spares. Shinpei recalls that Ushio will be back on the day of the summer festival, with no recollection of the tragedy. Ushio may have another chance to revive, but not without Heine and Karikiri`s interference.
Source: Disney+

titles.title: Ajiro Shinpei no Ichiban Nagai Hi
網代慎平の一番長い日
